title: Grants small city school districts the authority to provide cafeteria services to students should such district be subject to a contingency budget
summary: Requires the prosecution of juveniles who commit family offenses against his or her parent or legal guardian under article seven of the family court act, rather than article eight of such act.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to granting small city school districts the authority to provide cafeteria services to students should such district be subject to a contingency budget
